features: Soft bed pillowcase offers added comfort for a better night's sleep

Made of 100% cotton; wrinkle resistant and expertly woven to produce a lustrous sateen finish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value pillowcases!
reviews.reviewText: Very soft pillowcase thanks to its high thread count. They fit a standard pillow very well and should have a very long life span. I would recommend these to my friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, soft
reviews.reviewText: Color is true in person. Wash nicely and very soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and Affordable Pillowcases
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics 400 Thread Count Cotton Pillow Cases have pleasantly surprised me with their quality and affordability.The 400 thread count provides a nice balance of softness and durability. The cotton material feels cozy against the skin, making for a comfortable night's sleep. The neutral color options also make them versatile for various bedroom aesthetics.While they might not have the luxurious feel of higher-end pillowcases, these are an excellent budget-friendly option. They wash well and maintain their quality over time.Overall, if you're looking for affordable and comfortable pillowcases without compromising too much on quality, the Amazon Basics 400 Thread Count Cotton Pillow Cases are a solid choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Basics 400 Thread Count Cotton Pillow Cases
reviews.reviewText: Not as soft as I expected for a 400-thread count. My skin is oily and grey was not a good color choice for me since in about 3 days you can see discoloration on the pillow case. They do clean up very well in the laundry. If you have oily skin, go with a darker color (Navy, black, etc).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These really are the best pillowcases I have had. They are so soft and wash beautiful. I’m looking for the sheets to match too. I recommend them for everyone. 5 Star for sure !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and wrinkle free
reviews.reviewText: These pillow cases are great. We like that they don't stay wrinkled after using them and easy to care for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thick material but scratchy
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed by the thickness of the material. Certainly not cheap or flimsy, but found it too scratchy to sleep on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with the quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Great value. Highly recommend. Soft, smooth, bright white. I purchased these pillowcases with the intention of using them between washes for my expensive pillowcases, as I expected recieving mediocre quality for the low price. On the contrary, these rival the quality of a much higher thread count. Bravo! I'll be buying more.

The fabric is the perfect blend of a cooling soft material, that for one is lightweight, almost close to a satiny smooth, and doesn't collect pet hair (cats love the pillows) as quickly as other cases do. The fabric stays cooler much longer, and definitely adds to one's sleep comfort. Zero complaints.
Tamaño y materiales de buena calidad, estan suaves y se ven geniales

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Smooth, good quality & value, but no envelope?!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to match the fitted sheets - one I’ve had in rotation for 4 years that I’ve been really pleased with, one extra I’ve just bought - but it’s a bit of a mixed review for the pillowcases.Looking at some of the other reviews talking about the fabric being scratchy and hard makes me think I’ve received a totally different product! But just like the fitted sheets, the pillowcases are smooth due to the 400 thread count, with a slight sheen due to the sateen weave, and are exactly what I expected and hoped for in that area. The dark grey colour is versatile and also very pleasant to my eye, and I appreciated the sewn border detail along one side, which is an unexpected feature in a good value “basics” range.BUT - and it’s the factor that means I’m returning these instead of using them happily for years like the sheets - they don’t have an envelope! I think without exception until now, every pillowcase I’ve used in my 40 years has included an envelope flap to cover the end of the pillow, and I hadn’t realised this was a feature I needed to specifically look for! As I was testing the size on my current pillows (fine, incidentally, for standard sized pillows), I actually had to turn the case inside out because I couldn’t work out where the envelope flap was, and was confused about it just not existing!The product description doesn’t mention the envelope flap at all, and there aren’t any photos that shows the side view with the pillow inner exposed - just some careful shots chosen that make it look like any normal (enclosed) pillow, which I believe is misleading.Obviously there are bigger problems in the world than pillowcases without envelope flaps, but to me it seems like a very strange choice to sell open-ended ones, but then go to the trouble of adding a sewn border detail to that open end! If I were to keep these, I would have to position them so the open end was facing away from the door to the room (it would look scruffy and untidy to have a gaping open end on display, with a contrasting colour pillow inside), so that extra detail would also be less visible. More than just for aesthetics, I want an envelope flap for my pillowcases to protect the pillow itself from dust/fluff from my cats/etc, so I guess it’s back to the drawing board to find a good quality cotton pillowcase to match my sheets.
Soft, good quality cloth used as per price of item.Fast delivery 🚚 ......Size of pillow cover is adequate for most pillow sizes.Color on the pillow cover is deep and rich...
